thread.title: Suzanne Khan Congratulated Hrithik On The Success Of Kaabil
thread.title_full: Suzanne Khan Congratulated Hrithik On The Success Of Kaabil

title: Suzanne Khan Congratulated Hrithik On The Success Of Kaabil
text:
facebook 512 SHARES 
Yes, Suzanne Khan and Hrithik Roshan are not together anymore, but they still function as a family. It's amazing to see how they support each other, in spite of being separated. This weekend, after Hrithik's friends-and-family screening of Kaabil , Sussanne posted a cute photo of the two of them on social media to say that she's very proud of Hrithik. Check it out here. The most hearted performance in history of Indian cinema @iHrithik ! ❤Kaabil will melt u! 👊🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻kudos 2 d team @yamigautam @_SanjayGupta pic.twitter.com/TICcjCm9QJ
